title: Inverse problems for sumset sizes of finite sets of integers
abstract:
Let $A$ be a finite set of integers and let $hA$ be its $h$-fold sumset. This
paper investigates the sequence of sumset sizes $( |hA| )_{h=1}^{\infty}$, the
relations between these sequences for affinely inequivalent sets $A$ and $B$,
and the comparative growth rates and configurations of the sumset size
sequences $( |hA| )_{h=1}^{\infty}$ and $( |hA| )_{h=1}^{\infty}$.
